name: global.set('radio_name');
func:
global.set('radio_name',msg.payload);

rbe

format:
<script>
    (function(scope) {
        scope.$watch('msg', function(data) {
            var elem = document.getElementById("headerStatus")
            if(elem !== null) {
                elem.className = data.payload;
                elem.innerHTML = data.payload;
            }
        });
    })(scope);
</script>

name: button template
format:
<style>
  .filled { 
      height: 100% !important;

      padding: 0 !important;
      margin: 0 !important;

  }
  .nr-dashboard-template {
      padding: 0;
      margin: 0;

  }
  
  .rounded {
  border-radius: 12px 12px 12px 12px;

}
 
   .bigfont {
  font-size: 18px;
  color: white;
}

   .smallfont {
  font-size: 12px;
  color: white;
}
  
</style>

<script>
$('.vibrate').on('click', function() {
  navigator.vibrate(100);
});

function restore_bg(x) {
            $(this).css("background-color", x);
    };

$('.touched').on('mousedown', function() {
    
    var x= $(this).css("background-color");
    $(this).css("background-color", "yellow");
    
    setTimeout(restore_bg.bind(this,x),100);
    navigator.vibrate(80);
    });
    
</script>

name: css
format:
<style>
/* unvisited link */
a:link {
  color: white;
    text-decoration: none;
    vertical-align: bottom;
}

/* visited link */
a:visited {
  color: white;
    text-decoration: none;
    vertical-align: bottom;    
}

/* mouse over link */
a:hover {
  color: white;
    text-decoration: none;
        vertical-align: bottom;
}

/* selected link */
a:active {
  color: white;
    text-decoration: none;
        vertical-align: bottom;
}

.button9 {
      background-image: linear-gradient(to bottom right,  #8a8a8a6e, #00000070); 
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  border-radius:6px;
  background-color: grey;
  border: none; 
  color: white;
  padding: 1px 1px;
  text-align: center;
  text-decoration: none;
  display: inline-block;
  font-size: 16px;
  text-shadow: 0 0 1px #525252
}

</style>

name: Master style override
format:
<style>
body.nr-dashboard-theme {
 background-color: #333333;
 font-family: Calibri;
}
button, html, input, select, textarea {
 font-family: Calibri;
}
body.nr-dashboard-theme md-content md-card {
 background-color: #33333300;
 color: #d0d0d0;
}

/* Set header background style */
body.remove.nr-dashboard-theme md-toolbar {
 background-image: linear-gradient(to right,#8a8a8a6e, #00000070);
 box-shadow: 0px 1px 20px #0000008a;
}
/* Set groups background style */
.remove.nr-dashboard-theme ui-card-panel {
 background-image: linear-gradient(to bottom right, #8a8a8a6e, #00000070);
 border: 1px solid #555555;
 box-shadow: 0 0 20px #00000066;
}

/* Set group titles text */
.nr-dashboard-theme ui-card-panel p.nr-dashboard-cardtitle {
 color: #66ff66;
 text-shadow: 0 0 2px black;
}

.nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-form-button {
 background-image: linear-gradient(to bottom right,  #8a8a8a6e, #00000070);
 background-color: #00ad03;
 color: #d0d0d0;
 text-shadow: 0 0 2px #525252;
 border-radius:6px;
}

.nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-button .md-button {
 background-image: linear-gradient(to bottom right,  #8a8a8a6e, #00000070);
 background-color: #00ad03;
 color: #d0d0d0;
 text-shadow: 0 0 2px #525252;
 border-radius:6px;
}
.nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-button .md-button:hover {
 background-color: #00de00;
}

.nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-switch md-switch .md-thumb {
 background-image: linear-gradient(to bottom right, #8a8a8a6e, #00000070);
}
.nr-dashboard-button .md-button {
 box-shadow: 0 1px 3px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.26)!important;
 width: 100%!important;
 height: 100%!important;
 margin: 0!important;
 min-width: 0!important;
 min-height: 0!important;
}
.nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-slider .md-thumb:after {
 background-image: linear-gradient(to bottom right, #8a8a8a6e, #00000070);
 border-style: none;
}
.nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-numeric .value {
 background-color: #33333300;
 color:#d0d0d0;
}

.nr-dashboard-numeric .value {
 font-weight: 700;
 text-align: center;
 border: 0;
}


.nr-dashboard-form {
 display: inline-block;
 width: 100%;
 overflow-y: visible;
}
#SETTINGS_TEATED_cards {
 min-height: 260px;
}

</style>

name: Slice A Mute

func:
msg.payload = msg.payload.toFixed(1);
return msg;

name: Slice Label A
Slice Label A
Slice Label A
Slice Label A
Slice Label A
Clear
func:
pan = global.get("slice.a.slice_info.number"); //slice number

msg.payload = "slice s " + pan + " nb=off" 
global.set('slice.a.noise.nb',0)
global.set('slice.a.noise.nb_level',100)
node.send(msg);

msg.payload = "slice s " + pan + " anf=off" 
global.set('slice.a.noise.anf',0)
global.set('slice.a.noise.anf_level',100)
node.send(msg);

msg.payload = "slice s " + pan + " wnb=off" 
global.set('slice.a.noise.wnb',0)
global.set('slice.a.noise.wnb_level',100)
node.send(msg);

var pan = global.get("slice.a.slice_info.pan"); // hex Pan ID
msg.payload = "display pan s " + pan + " rfgain=0"
node.send(msg);




return;

name: A Band
BW A
Calc BW
func:
bw = msg.payload.filter_hi - msg.payload.filter_lo

global.set('slice.a.slice_info.bw',bw)
msg.payload = bw/1000
msg.bw = (bw / 1000).toFixed(1) + "k"

return msg;

4-way switch

Dashboard CSS
format:
<style id="dashboard-styles-override">
.switchwrapper {
  margin: auto 0;
}
.toggle_radio{

    margin: auto;
    overflow: hidden;
    border-radius: 50px;
    position: relative;
    height: 26px;
    border: 1px solid var(--nr-dashboard-groupBorderColor);
    background: var(--nr-dashboard-widgetBgndColor);
}
.toggle_radio > * {
  float: left;
}
.toggle_radio input[type=radio]{
  display: none;
}
.toggle_4{
     width: 25%;
     font-size: 14px;     
}
.toggle_3{
     width: 33%;
}
.toggle_2{
     width: 50%;
}
.toggle_radio label{

  display: block;
  height: 20px;
  margin: 0;
  line-height :18px;
  border-radius: 50px;
  cursor: pointer;
  z-index: 1;
  text-align: center;
}
.toggle_radio label >p {
    background:transparent !important;
}
.toggle_option_slider{

  height: 20px;
  position: absolute;
  top: 3px;
  border-radius: 50px;
  transition: all .4s ease;
  z-index:0;
  left:3px;
  opacity:0.4;
  background: #66ff66;
}
.filled { 
      height: 100% !important;

      padding: 0 !important;
      margin: 0 !important;
}
.nr-dashboard-template {
      padding: 0;
      margin: 0;
}
  
.rounded {
  border-radius: 12px 12px 12px 12px;
}
 
.bigfont {
  font-size: 16px;
}

.smallfont {
  font-size: 12px;
}
</style>

name: MOX
TX Inhibit Config
Slice A TX Set

func:
msg.payload = (parseFloat(msg.payload) * 1000).toFixed(3) 
msg.color = "#707070"
msg.font = "#66ff66"
global.set('slice.a.freq',msg.payload)
return msg;

name: Tx outputs
Tune Power
func:
var tune = msg.payload

msg.payload = "transmit s tunepower=" + msg.payload
flow.set('tune_power',tune)
return msg;

name: Tx Power
Tune Power
func:
var tune = msg.payload

msg.payload = "transmit s rfpower=" + msg.payload
flow.set('rf_power',tune)
return msg;
